import React from 'react'; import { Card, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import koreaIcon from '../images/language/korea.png'; const Main = () => { const dummy = { lastBook: { title: '위대한 게츠비', author: 'F. 스콧 피츠제럴드', image: 'http://minumsa.minumsa.com/wp-content/uploads/bookcover/075_위대한개츠비-300x511.jpg', startDate: '', currentPage: 100, endPage: 400, language: { name: '한국어', image: koreaIcon, }, }, }; return (

마지막으로 읽은 책

{dummy.lastBook.title}

{dummy.lastBook.author}
{ dummy.lastBook .language.name }

이번달 통계
); }; export default Main;
